resources.string: In this page you can view your daily tasks. Pressing on the plus button you can create a new task to do for today. By clicking in the modify button of the task you can update ,delete or complete it. The completed tasks are in the lower parte ot the screen.
In this page you can see your calendar and the tasks you have for each day. Organize yourself adding new tasks through the add task button. Stay OrganizD , stay Foolish
In this page you can do classic pomodoro: 25 minutes of work and 5 minutes of rest. Stay focused and get some work done!
In this page you will see your progress within the app . You can see your level. Try tu surpass your limits!!!
OrganizD is an app developed by Andrea Tassi and Endri Sefa, two students of Universit√† Politecnica delle Marche.
